        Evaluate the prepared query (SPARQL query as String) on the provided endpoint.
        Specified by:
        getStatements in interface TripleSource
        Parameters:
        preparedQuery - a prepared query to evaluate (SPARQL query as String)
        conn - the connection to the endpoint
        bindings - the bindings to use
        filterExpr - the filter expression to apply or null if there is no filter or if it is evaluated already
        Returns:
